G

generateLatexString() - Method in class circuitikztool.CircuitMaker
Converts the entire schematic into a LaTeX figure using circuitikz, individual components generate their own latex line in the Components object.

getComponentFromXML(String) - Static method in class circuitikztool.Component
 
getComponentLabel() - Method in class circuitikztool.Component
 
getComponentLabelString() - Method in class circuitikztool.Component
returns the component label string, including information about the placement of the component for display in the UI.
getComponentList() - Method in class circuitikztool.CircuitMaker
returns a string array representing each component placed in the CircuitMaker window, different components may have different formatting, thus getting the individual component strings is handled by the Component object.
getDataFromXMLTag(String, String) - Static method in class circuitikztool.Component
 
getDeviceID() - Method in class circuitikztool.Component
 
getEnd() - Method in class circuitikztool.Component
returns the end coordinate of a path component, throws IllegalStateException if component is not a path component
getLatexLine() - Method in class circuitikztool.Component
outputs the formatted LaTeX line representing this component, in special cases this function may return multiple lines of LaTeX code
getLatexString() - Method in class circuitikztool.Component
returns the latex parameters of the current component
getPosition() - Method in class circuitikztool.Component

getSelectedComponentIndex() - Method in class circuitikztool.CircuitMaker
gets the current selected component index
getSelectedComponentLabel() - Method in class circuitikztool.CircuitMaker
gets the component label of the currently selected component.
getSelectedComponentLatexString() - Method in class circuitikztool.CircuitMaker
returns the latex parameter string of the currently selected component in components ArrayList
getStart() - Method in class circuitikztool.Component
returns the beginning coordinate of a path component, throws IllegalStateException if component is not a path component
gridColor - Static variable in class circuitikztool.Preferences
